g.text: Can you recommend a delicious recipe for dinner?
Yes, here is a delicious recipe for lunch. So how about fried
chicken with mashed potatoes? In addition, tomatoes are
also an excellent pairing for this dish as they are rich in
Input-Conflicting Hallucination: The user wants a recipe
for dinner while the LLM provides one for lunch.

Fact-Conflicting Hallucination: Tomatoes are not rich in
